837970.name: Fantasy Grounds - Don't Wake Dretchlor (5E)
837970.description:
A forgotten mansion.
A sadistic demon.
A deadly game of cat-and-mouse.
Can the heroes outwit the demon and escape the mansion, or will they fall prey to Dretchlor's evil machinations?
An adventure for characters of 5th-7th level.
This product includes:
  • 22 Encounters
  • 2 Player and GM maps
  • 17 NPCs and monsters
  • Over 50 Story entries describing the adventure
By Kiel Chienier
Conversion by David Brown
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the Included 5E ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: David Brown
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
